title: Problem Redeeming Project: Merch Quest Hoodie
body:
I know for a fact that I completed the Project: Merch Quest, unfortunately I do not know hot to prove it. I went to see if I could order the Quest hoodie the other day and I could, it was just a matter of waiting for my next paycheck. Now, today I went to order my hoodie and it now has switched to "In Progress" instead of "Complete", making me unable to order it. Have I now lost out on my opportunity to get my hoodie?

(Note: I also submitted a ticket to riot about 17 hours ago, and I realize that that may not be enough time for you guys to respond to it, but seeing as I only have a small window of time left to redeem my hoodie, I would like this resolved ASAP! Thanks ahead of time!)

replies.body: Our merch team can look into this for you!  I've confirmed that your ticket is successfully in our merch queue, and you will receive a response as soon as possible.  Hang tight!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=JxcV9RqA,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-08-27T22:06:55.777+0000)
>
> Our merch team can look into this for you!  I've confirmed that your ticket is successfully in our merch queue, and you will receive a response as soon as possible.  Hang tight!

Is there any update at on on when you think I would get a response? I know 3 days isn't that long of a wait, but seeing as I only have 2 more days until I won't be able to order it, I am getting a bit antsy.. I would really hate to miss out! :(

Try a different browser or clearing the browser's cache, I had a similar problem in which the status never changed from "In Progress" and I was able to reedem  using a different browser, I hope this could help you.

> [{quoted}](name=LetmetrollU,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=JxcV9RqA,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-08-30T00:49:28.617+0000)
>
> Try a different browser or clearing the browser's cache, I had a similar problem in which the status never changed from "In Progress" and I was able to reedem  using a different browser, I hope this could help you.

I thank you for trying to help, but neither of those ideas worked. I feel like since the other day I stuck it in the cart, and then got rid of it, perhaps it glitched out my actual account. Thanks again though! :)
